<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Inlines functions marked as &quot;always&#95;inline&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that this does not inline call sites marked as always&#95;inline and does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not delete the functions even when all users are inlined. The normal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inliner should be used to handle call site inlining, this pass&#39;s goal is to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be the simplest possible pass to remove always&#95;inline function definitions&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// uses by inlining them. The \\c GlobalDCE pass can be used to remove these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// functions once all users are gone.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/alwaysinlinerpass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/alwaysinlinerpass/#aab840d849a6e3381ac0db1dc6a7e9330">AlwaysInlinerPass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;AlwaysInlinerPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
